item.title: CFO1;OsMADS32
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os01g52680 RAPdb gene ID: Os01g0726400 Gene Symbol: CFO1 OsMADS32 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: CsSPL
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa3M850670 Gene Symbol: CsSPL Gene Name: SPOROCYTELESS Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: CsSPL functions as an adaptor between HD-ZIP III and CsWUS transcription factors regulating anther and ovule development in cucumber.

item.title: CsWUS
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa6M505860 Gene Symbol: CsWUS Gene Name: WUSCHEL Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: CsSPL functions as an adaptor between HD-ZIP III and CsWUS transcription factors regulating anther and ovule development in cucumber.

item.title: GhSWEET12
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gorai.005G195100 Gene Symbol: GhSWEET12 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: RNA-seq and protein−DNA binding assays revealed that GhMYB212 was closely linked to the pathways of sucrose and starch transportation and metabolism, directly controling the expression of a sucrose transporter gene GhSWEET12.

item.title: GhVIN1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhVIN1 Gene Name: vacuolar invertase1 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Silencing the vacuolar invertase gene GhVIN1 blocks cotton fiber initiation from the ovule epidermis, probably by suppressing a cohort of regulatory genes via sugar signaling.

item.title: GhWRKY16
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D06G0175 Gene Symbol: GhWRKY16 Gene Name: Genome: TM-1 reference genome Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Our data demonstrate that GhWRKY16 plays a crucial role in fiber initiation and elongation, and that GhWRKY16 phosphorylation by GhMPK3-1 is essential for the transcriptional activation on downstream genes during the fiber development of cotton.

item.title: PbCysp1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PbCysp1 Gene Name: ENESCENCE-ASSOCIATED CYSTEINE PROTEINASE 1 Genome: Species: Pyrus bretschneideri Functional Descriptions: PbEIL1 acts upstream of PbCysp1 to regulate ovule senescence in seedless pear.

item.title: PbEIL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PbEIL1 Gene Name: ethylene-insensitive 3-like Genome: Species: Pyrus bretschneideri Functional Descriptions: PbEIL1 acts upstream of PbCysp1 to regulate ovule senescence in seedless pear.

item.title: PeDL2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PeDL2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Phalaenopsis equestris Functional Descriptions: Virus-induced gene silencing (VIGS) of PeDL1 and PeDL2 affected the number of protuberant ovule initials differentiated from the placenta.

item.title: PgBEL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Pg029909.1 Gene Symbol: PgBEL1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Punica granatum Functional Description: We report the function of PgCRC and PgINO in ovule and seed development and show that PgCRC and PgINO interact with PgBEL1.

item.title: PgCRC
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Pg016200.1 Gene Symbol: PgCRC Gene Name: Genome: Species: Punica granatum Functional Description: We report the function of PgCRC and PgINO in ovule and seed development and show that PgCRC and PgINO interact with PgBEL1.

item.title: PgINO
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Pg016102.1 Gene Symbol: PgINO Gene Name: Genome: Species: Punica granatum Functional Description: We report the function of PgCRC and PgINO in ovule and seed development and show that PgCRC and PgINO interact with PgBEL1.

item.title: ScFRK2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: ScFRK2 Gene Name: Fertilization-related kinase 2 Genome: Species: Solanum chacoense Functional Descriptions: The ScFRK2 MAP kinase kinase kinase from Solanum chacoense affects pollen development and viability.

item.title: ScRALF3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: ScRALF3 Gene Name: rapid alkalinization factor 3 Genome: Species: Solanum chacoense Functional Descriptions: ScRALF3, a secreted RALF-like peptide involved in cell–cell communication between the sporophyte and the female gametophyte in a solanaceous species.

item.title: Sl-IAA27
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Sl-IAA27 Gene Name: Aux/IAA transcription factor27 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Phenotypes Associated with Down-Regulation of Sl-IAA27 Support Functional Diversity Among Aux/IAA Family Members in Tomato.

item.title: SlANT2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc04g077490 Gene Symbol: SlANT2 Gene Name: ANT homolog2 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: S.

item.title: SlCRCa
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc01g010240 Gene Symbol: SlCRCa Gene Name: CRABS CLAW (CRC) homologue Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: SlCRCa is a key D-class gene controlling ovule fate determination in tomato.

item.title: SlHB15A

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc02g067760 Gene Symbol: SlMYB21 Gene Name: Genome: Tomato Genome version SL4.

item.title: TaAGO1b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaAGO1b Gene Name: Argonaute1 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Two putative wheat Argonaute genes, TaAGO1b and TaAGO4, were cloned.

item.title: TaAGO4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaAGO4 Gene Name: Argonaute4 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Two putative wheat Argonaute genes, TaAGO1b and TaAGO4, were cloned.

item.title: VviINO
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: VIT_201s0127g00330 Gene Symbol: VviINO Gene Name: Vitis vinifera INNER NO OUTER Genome: Vitis vinifera genome 12X V2 Species: Vitis vinifera Functional Descriptions: We conclusively demonstrated that the grapevine orthologue VviINO retains similar protein targets and activity in the grape as in Arabidopsis, since it could fully restore the outer integument growth in Arabidopsis ino-1 mutant.

item.title: VvMADS28
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: VvMADS28 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Vitis vinifera Functional Descriptions: In this study, we demonstrate an essential role for the grapevine MADS-box gene VvMADS28 in morphogenesis of the ovule.
